DOC.brief_summary: To investigate the effect of milk delivered from mountain-pasture grazing cows on risk markers of the metabolic syndrome and type-2 diabetes with the effect of conventional Danish milk. The study should reveal the importance of phytanic acid content for these effects.
DOC.brief_title: Effects of Milk Derived From Mountain-pasture Grazing Cows on Risk Markers of the Metabolic Syndrome Compared to Conventional Danish Milk
DOC.criteria: sign written consent Age: 5070 BMI: 2030 increased risk of developing MS refrain from dietary supplements and blood donations prior to, and during the study poor compliance if they suffering from any chronic or long lasting illness abuse of alcohol or medicine
